alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 1:28PM EDT until July 06 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ripley County in southeastern Indiana... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 128 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Osgood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Holton, Napoleon, Millhousen, Rexville, Benham, New Marion, Friendship, Versailles Lake, Cross Plains, Otter Village and Olean. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
